summary: Crimson is a genetically superior Nord ready for you to play as her. A happy mistake when creating a new character, I thought that everyone should be able to play as this beauty
descriptionHtml:
[i] Crimson[/i] is a genetically superior [i]Nord [/i]ready for you to play as her. A happy mistake when creating a new character, I thought that everyone should be able to play as this beauty.

-I haven't released anything in a while so I thought I should share this save file.
-Starts out low stats in Riften area (outside)

-Uses KSP hairdoos

[i][b][size=4]Install-[/size][/b][/i]
-Extract save file into documents/mygames/skyrim/saves
author: Darnell Nugget
